description:
'Lil Evan is such a cutie. He's got "Tyke" written all over him.
YES, he is 20 years, and actually, by the time this video airs, he will be 21, as his 21st was only a month away when we shot this video. He looks a lot younger.
Evan is half country boy, half surfer dude. He grew up on the beach and feels comfortable on any board- surf, skate, and snow. He's got the coolest eyes, and an amazing 6-pack.
He was a little nervous for the video shoot, but thankfully he's happy to show off his 'lil bubble butt. He was also pretty eager to bust a nut and we got down to that pretty quickly. He does get some height on it!
title: Evan - Solo
